title: Replacing the Belt: Easy Lite Cyclonic Quick Vac UD20005
transcripts: To remove and replace the belt. Turn the power off unplug the power cord and lay the cleaner upside down to expose the bottom of the base. Remove the five screws from the nozzle guard using a Phillips screwdriver and lift off the nozzle guard remove the damaged belt or anything tangled in the brush roll. Use only an authorized dirt devil replacement belt. Slide the new belt on to the motor shaft and place the other end of the belt on the open area of the brush roll with no bristles pull firmly forward on the brush roll stretching the belt and set the brush roll into the nozzle with the end caps properly aligned rotate the brush roll manually to make sure the belt is properly aligned and moves freely reattach the nozzle guard and replace the screws. Visit our website to buy belts on line or call our toll free customer service number.
